pages.title: Controller
pages.text: The Controller is your main interface to the Turbine.$(br2)Right-click on the Controller to open its graphical user interface. From there, you can turn the Turbine on or off, check how much vapor and coolant are present in the internal tanks, see how fast the $(l:bigreactors/rotor)Rotor$(/l) is spinning, and monitor how much energy is being generated.

You can also regulate how much vapor is flowing around the $(l:bigreactors/rotor)Rotor$(/l), decide what to do with the vapor once itâ€™s condensed back to the original coolant, and engage or disengage the $(l:bigreactors/coils)Induction Coils$(/l).$(br2)If you hover over a control in the interface, a tooltip will be displayed with additional information or an explanatory text for that control.
$(l)Mandatory:$() at least one is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes
